starts.title: Start a sentence for the other player to finish
Pretend you are a mirror image of the other player

examples.title: Both players improvise a 2-line poem in unison
examples.extra: Echo it in a whisper duet facing each other

examples.title: Both players invent a 3-move handshake
examples.extra: Add a foot tap on the last beat and repeat

examples.title: Both players speak only in sound effects for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Mirror the other player's sounds for 5 more seconds

examples.title: Current player pantomimes an object; the other 'uses' it
examples.extra: Switch roles and keep eyes closed while guessing

examples.title: Both players trace shapes in the air for the other to guess
examples.extra: Then draw the shape on each other's forearm (over clothes) with a fingertip

examples.title: Both players outline each other's back and sides with flattened palms (over clothes)
examples.extra: Move slowly while maintaining eye contact

examples.title: Current player draws letters on the other's back (over clothes) to guess
examples.extra: Switch roles and use two letters

examples.title: Both players mime a meet-cute scene together
examples.extra: End in a close pose shoulder-to-shoulder

examples.title: Both players perform a silent duet while holding one hand
examples.extra: Close your eyes for the last 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players choreograph a 10-second slow dance with foreheads nearly touching
examples.extra: Finish cheek-to-cheek for a count of 3

examples.title: Current player sculpts the other into a dramatic pose
examples.extra: Choose a pose that requires standing close; then switch

examples.title: Both players stage a near-kiss scene ending in a long embrace
examples.extra: Optionally share a gentle kiss if you both want to

examples.title: Both players dip into a close embrace and hold
examples.extra: Cheek-to-cheek, whisper one line from an epic romance

examples.title: Both players parody a grand love confession in two lines
examples.extra: Whisper your lines from 6 inches apart

examples.title: Both players paint imaginary body art on each other's arms (over clothes)
examples.extra: Extend to shoulders with slow strokes

examples.title: Both players mirror slow dance steps without touching
examples.extra: Step one pace closer and repeat

examples.title: Both players tango-walk in a straight line with hands on each other's shoulders
examples.extra: Move hands briefly to each other's waist (over clothes)

examples.title: Both players do a 'costume styling' pass: fix collars, smooth hair, adjust sleeves
examples.extra: Turn slowly while the other adds one more adjustment

examples.title: Current player outlines the other's silhouette in the air with hovering hands
examples.extra: Gently tap shoulders and elbows to 'pin' the outline; then switch

examples.title: Both players freeze like mannequins; the other positions arms and hips (over clothes)
examples.extra: Swap and add one more adjustment

examples.title: Both players perform a human-mirror dance palm-to-palm
examples.extra: Slide palms up to shoulders and back down in sync

examples.title: Current player sets a photo-pose: back-to-chest with arms around waist (over clothes)
examples.extra: Switch roles and hold for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players pose chest-to-chest (clothed) like living statues
examples.extra: Breathe together for a slow count of 10

examples.title: Current player offers a seated 'chair' knee-to-knee; the other perches briefly (clothed)
examples.extra: Switch roles and hold for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players create a living sculpture: arms entwined, shoulder-to-shoulder
examples.extra: Add a soft cheek-to-cheek touch for a slow count of 3

examples.title: Both players compose a 'massage duet': alternate strokes on each other's shoulders to a 10-second rhythm (over clothes)
examples.extra: Use massage oil

examples.title: Current player gives a slow, clothed, performance-style lap dance
examples.extra: Seated player may place hands on shoulders

examples.title: Both players trace a small heart on each other's chest (over clothes)
examples.extra: Follow with a warm hug for 5 seconds

examples.title: Current player slowly removes the other's jacket or overshirt as if on stage
examples.extra: Reverse roles and repeat a little closer

examples.title: Current player straddles the other's lap (clothed) for a dramatic pose
examples.extra: Hold the pose for a slow count of 20
